gameSubtitle:
A frantic time-management game based on the Parable of the Sower.
Play as a Pastor, Deacon, or Member to nurture visitors and keep them rooted in the church.

pastor.name: Pastor
pastor.description: Strong teaching. Good at deeply rooting Good Soil and Rocks.

deacon.name: Deacon
deacon.description: Fast mover. Excellent at removing Thorns (cares of life).

member.name: Member
member.description: High energy. Best at catching those on the Path before they leave.

instructions: Click to move. Click visitors to interact with them.

unknown.name: Unknown Visitor
unknown.description: Interact to reveal their heart type

path.name: Path - Hardened Heart
path.description: Needs quick greeting or leaves very fast (Mark 4:15)

rock.name: Rocky Ground - Shallow Faith
rock.description: Receives with joy but needs teaching to withstand testing (Mark 4:16-17)

thorns.name: Thorns - Distracted by Worries
thorns.description: Needs constant service to overcome cares of life (Mark 4:18-19)

good.name: Good Soil - Receptive Heart
good.description: Stable, needs deep teaching to bear much fruit (Mark 4:20)

pastor.name: Pastor
pastor.description: Excels at teaching, best for Good Soil and Rocky Ground

deacon.name: Deacon
deacon.description: Fast and service-oriented, best for Thorny Ground

member.name: Member
member.description: Great at greeting, best for catching Path visitors quickly

visitorNeeds.title: Visitor Needs
visitorNeeds.description: Visitors show icons when they need specific care:

visitors.name: Visitors
visitors.description: Current number of people in service

patienceBar.name: Patience Bar
patienceBar.description: Green = patient, Red = about to leave

gameOver.title: Service Complete!
gameOver.reflection: The farmer sows the word. Some people are like seed along the path... others, like seed sown on good soil, hear the word, accept it, and produce a crop. (Mark 4:14-20)
